{
    "project": "kubeasy",
    "env": "dev",
    "version": "1.14.10",
    "network": "flannel",
    "runtime": "docker",
    "dnsDomain": "cluster.local",
    "serviceSubnet": "10.96.0.0/12",
    "podSubnet": "10.244.0.0/16",
    "vip": {
        "id": 1,
        "type": "slb",
        "addr": "172.16.115.10",
        "mask": 16
    },
    "node": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "role": "master",
            "ipv4Addr": "172.16.115.11",
            "ipv6Addr": "",
            "ansible_ssh_port": 22,
            "ansible_ssh_user": "root",
            "ansible_ssh_pass": "root",
            "ansible_sudo_user": "",
            "ansible_sudo_pass": "",
            "gpu": false,
            "cluster_id": 1
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "role": "master",
            "ipv4Addr": "172.16.115.12",
            "ipv6Addr": "",
            "ansible_ssh_port": 22,
            "ansible_ssh_user": "root",
            "ansible_ssh_pass": "root",
            "ansible_sudo_user": "",
            "ansible_sudo_pass": "",
            "gpu": false,
            "cluster_id": 1
        },
        {
            "id": 3,
            "role": "master",
            "ipv4Addr": "172.16.115.13",
            "ipv6Addr": "",
            "ansible_ssh_port": 22,
            "ansible_ssh_user": "root",
            "ansible_ssh_pass": "root",
            "ansible_sudo_user": "",
            "ansible_sudo_pass": "",
            "gpu": false,
            "cluster_id": 1
        },
        {
            "id": 4,
            "role": "worker",
            "ipv4Addr": "172.16.115.14",
            "ipv6Addr": "",
            "ansible_ssh_port": 22,
            "ansible_ssh_user": "root",
            "ansible_ssh_pass": "root",
            "ansible_sudo_user": "",
            "ansible_sudo_pass": "",
            "gpu": false,
            "cluster_id": 1
        },
        {
            "id": 5,
            "role": "worker",
            "ipv4Addr": "172.16.115.15",
            "ipv6Addr": "",
            "ansible_ssh_port": 22,
            "ansible_ssh_user": "root",
            "ansible_ssh_pass": "root",
            "ansible_sudo_user": "",
            "ansible_sudo_pass": "",
            "gpu": false,
            "cluster_id": 1
        },
        {
            "id": 6,
            "role": "worker",
            "ipv4Addr": "172.16.115.16",
            "ipv6Addr": "",
            "ansible_ssh_port": 22,
            "ansible_ssh_user": "root",
            "ansible_ssh_pass": "root",
            "ansible_sudo_user": "",
            "ansible_sudo_pass": "",
            "gpu": false,
            "cluster_id": 1
        }
    ],
    "group_vars": {
        "kubernetes": {
            "docker": {
                "datadir": "/var/lib/docker",
                "daemon": {
                    "exec-opts": [
                        "native.cgroupdriver=systemd"
                    ],
                    "registry-mirrors": [
                        "https://i3jtbyvy.mirror.aliyuncs.com"
                    ],
                    "storage-driver": "overlay2",
                    "storage-opts": [
                        "overlay2.override_kernel_check=true"
                    ],
                    "log-driver": "json-file",
                    "log-opts": {
                        "max-size": "100m",
                        "max-file": "5"
                    },
                    "max-concurrent-downloads": 20,
                    "max-concurrent-uploads": 10,
                    "userland-proxy": false,
                    "experimental": false,
                    "icc": false,
                    "debug": false,
                    "features": {
                        "buildkit": false
                    },
                    "builder": {
                        "gc": {
                            "enabled": true,
                            "defaultKeepStorage": "20GB"
                        }
                    },
                    "default-ulimits": {
                        "nofile": {
                            "Name": "nofile",
                            "Hard": 65535,
                            "Soft": 65535
                        },
                        "nproc": {
                            "Name": "nproc",
                            "Hard": 65535,
                            "Soft": 65535
                        },
                        "core": {
                            "Name": "core",
                            "Hard": -1,
                            "Soft": -1
                        }
                    }
                }
            },
            "containerd": {
                "datadir": "/var/lib/containerd",
                "daemon": {
                    "endpoint": [
                        "https://registry-1.docker.io",
                        "https://i3jtbyvy.mirror.aliyuncs.com"
                    ]
                }
            },
            "etcd": {
                "datadir": "/var/lib/etcd",
                "backupDir": "/etc/kubernetes/tmp",
                "extraArgs": [
                    "--auto-compaction-retention=1",
                    "--max-request-bytes=33554432",
                    "--quota-backend-bytes=8589934592",
                    "--enable-v2=false",
                    "--snapshot-count=10000",
                    "--cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384"
                ]
            },
            "apiServer": {
                "encryption": "Tsg7sO4Ki/W3s9bfwGfTi8ECcp+/3uDedQMq6rLQTIY=",
                "certSANs": [
                    "DNS:*.kubernetes.local"
                ],
                "extraArgs": [
                    "--event-ttl=4h",
                    "--anonymous-auth=false",
                    "--kubelet-preferred-address-types=InternalIP,ExternalIP,Hostname",
                    "--service-node-port-range=30000-32767",
                    "--runtime-config=api/all=true",
                    "--authorization-mode=Node,RBAC",
                    "--profiling=false",
                    "--enable-admission-plugins=ServiceAccount,NamespaceLifecycle,NodeRestriction,LimitRanger,PersistentVolumeClaimResize,DefaultStorageClass,DefaultTolerationSeconds,MutatingAdmissionWebhook,ValidatingAdmissionWebhook,ResourceQuota,Priority",
                    "--tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256"
                ],
                "log": {
                    "level": 1
                }
            },
            "controllerManager": {
                "extraArgs": [
                    "--tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256",
                    "--terminated-pod-gc-threshold=12500",
                    "--node-monitor-period=5s",
                    "--node-monitor-grace-period=40s",
                    "--pod-eviction-timeout=5m0s",
                    "--profiling=false",
                    "--kube-api-qps=100",
                    "--kube-api-burst=100"
                ],
                "log": {
                    "level": 1
                }
            },
            "scheduler": {
                "extraArgs": [
                    "--tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256",
                    "--profiling=false",
                    "--kube-api-qps=100"
                ],
                "log": {
                    "level": 1
                }
            },
            "kubelet": {
                "extraArgs": [
                    "--anonymous-auth=false",
                    "--authorization-mode=Webhook",
                    "--allowed-unsafe-sysctls=net.*",
                    "--network-plugin=cni"
                ],
                "log": {
                    "level": 1
                }
            },
            "proxy": {
                "extraArgs": [
                    "--proxy-mode=ipvs"
                ],
                "log": {
                    "level": 1
                }
            }
        },
        "all": {
            "timezone": "Asia/Shanghai",
            "modprobe": {
                "filename": "/etc/modules-load.d/00-k8s.conf",
                "params": [
                    "br_netfilter",
                    "nf_conntrack",
                    "overlay",
                    "xt_REDIRECT",
                    "xt_owner",
                    "ip_tables",
                    "ip6table_filter"
                ]
            },
            "ipvs": {
                "filename": "/etc/modules-load.d/01-k8s.conf",
                "params": [
                    "ip_vs",
                    "ip_vs_rr",
                    "ip_vs_wrr",
                    "ip_vs_sh"
                ]
            },
            "sysctl": {
                "filename": "/etc/sysctl.d/100-kubernetes.conf",
                "params": {
                    "net.ipv6.ip_forward": 1,
                    "net.ipv6.conf.all.forwarding": 1,
                    "net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6": 0,
                    "net.ipv6.conf.default.disable_ipv6": 0,
                    "net.ipv6.conf.lo.disable_ipv6": 0,
                    "net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_time": 600,
                    "net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_intvl": 30,
                    "net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_probes": 10,
                    "net.ipv4.neigh.default.gc_stale_time": 120,
                    "net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter": 0,
                    "net.ipv4.conf.default.forwarding": 1,
                    "net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter": 0,
                    "net.ipv4.conf.default.arp_announce": 2,
                    "net.ipv4.conf.lo.arp_announce": 2,
                    "net.ipv4.conf.all.arp_announce": 2,
                    "net.ipv4.ip_forward": 1,
                    "net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_buckets": 5000,
                    "net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies": 1,
                    "net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog": 1024,
                    "net.ipv4.tcp_synack_retries": 2,
                    "net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-ip6tables": 1,
                    "net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-iptables": 1,
                    "net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-arptables": 1,
                    "net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_max": 10485760,
                    "fs.inotify.max_user_watches": 524288,
                    "fs.may_detach_mounts": 1,
                    "fs.file-max": 52706963,
                    "fs.nr_open": 52706963,
                    "vm.swappiness": 0,
                    "vm.overcommit_memory": 1,
                    "vm.panic_on_oom": 0,
                    "net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_established": 300,
                    "net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_close_wait": 3600,
                    "net.core.netdev_max_backlog": 10000,
                    "kernel.pid_max": 65535,
                    "net.core.default_qdisc": "fq",
                    "net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control": "bbr",
                    "net.ipv4.neigh.default.gc_thresh1": 1024,
                    "net.ipv4.neigh.default.gc_thresh2": 4096,
                    "net.ipv4.neigh.default.gc_thresh3": 8192,
                    "net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_buckets": 655360,
                    "fs.inotify.max_user_instances": 524288,
                    "net.core.rmem_max": 2500000,
                    "vm.max_map_count": 262144
                }
            },
            "limits": [
                {
                    "domain": "*",
                    "limit_type": "soft",
                    "limit_item": "nproc",
                    "value": 65536
                },
                {
                    "domain": "*",
                    "limit_type": "hard",
                    "limit_item": "nproc",
                    "value": 65536
                },
                {
                    "domain": "*",
                    "limit_type": "soft",
                    "limit_item": "nofile",
                    "value": 65536
                },
                {
                    "domain": "*",
                    "limit_type": "hard",

            "gpu": false,
            "cluster_id": 1
        },
        {
            "id": 4,
            "role": "worker",
            "ipv4Addr": "172.16.115.14",
            "ipv6Addr": "",
            "ansible_ssh_port": 22,
            "ansible_ssh_user": "root",
            "ansible_ssh_pass": "root",
            "ansible_sudo_user": "",
            "ansible_sudo_pass": "",
            "gpu": false,
            "cluster_id": 1
        },
        {
            "id": 5,
            "role": "worker",
            "ipv4Addr": "172.16.115.15",
            "ipv6Addr": "",
            "ansible_ssh_port": 22,
            "ansible_ssh_user": "root",
            "ansible_ssh_pass": "root",
            "ansible_sudo_user": "",
            "ansible_sudo_pass": "",
            "gpu": false,
            "cluster_id": 1
        },
        {
            "id": 6,
            "role": "worker",
            "ipv4Addr": "172.16.115.16",
            "ipv6Addr": "",
            "ansible_ssh_port": 22,
            "ansible_ssh_user": "root",
            "ansible_ssh_pass": "root",
            "ansible_sudo_user": "",
            "ansible_sudo_pass": "",
            "gpu": false,
            "cluster_id": 1
        }
    ],
    "group_vars": {
        "kubernetes": {
            "docker": {
                "datadir": "/var/lib/docker",
                "daemon": {
                    "exec-opts": [
                        "native.cgroupdriver=systemd"
                    ],
                    "registry-mirrors": [
                        "https://i3jtbyvy.mirror.aliyuncs.com"
                    ],
                    "storage-driver": "overlay2",
                    "storage-opts": [
                        "overlay2.override_kernel_check=true"
                    ],
                    "log-driver": "json-file",
                    "log-opts": {
                        "max-size": "100m",
                        "max-file": "5"
                    },
                    "max-concurrent-downloads": 20,
                    "max-concurrent-uploads": 10,
                    "userland-proxy": false,
                    "experimental": false,
                    "icc": false,
                    "debug": false,
                    "features": {
                        "buildkit": false
                    },
                    "builder": {
                        "gc": {
                            "enabled": true,
                            "defaultKeepStorage": "20GB"
                        }
                    },
                    "default-ulimits": {
                        "nofile": {
                            "Name": "nofile",
                            "Hard": 65535,
                            "Soft": 65535
                        },
                        "nproc": {
                            "Name": "nproc",
                            "Hard": 65535,
                            "Soft": 65535
                        },
                        "core": {
                            "Name": "core",
                            "Hard": -1,
                            "Soft": -1
                        }
                    }
                }
            },
            "containerd": {
                "datadir": "/var/lib/containerd",
                "daemon": {
                    "endpoint": [
                        "https://registry-1.docker.io",
                        "https://i3jtbyvy.mirror.aliyuncs.com"
                    ]
                }
            },
            "etcd": {
                "datadir": "/var/lib/etcd",
                "backupDir": "/etc/kubernetes/tmp",
                "extraArgs": [
                    "--auto-compaction-retention=1",
                    "--max-request-bytes=33554432",
                    "--quota-backend-bytes=8589934592",
                    "--enable-v2=false",
                    "--snapshot-count=10000",
                    "--cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384"
                ]
            },
            "apiServer": {
                "encryption": "Tsg7sO4Ki/W3s9bfwGfTi8ECcp+/3uDedQMq6rLQTIY=",
                "certSANs": [
                    "DNS:*.kubernetes.local"
                ],
                "extraArgs": [
                    "--event-ttl=4h",
                    "--anonymous-auth=false",
                    "--kubelet-preferred-address-types=InternalIP,ExternalIP,Hostname",
                    "--service-node-port-range=30000-32767",
                    "--runtime-config=api/all=true",
                    "--authorization-mode=Node,RBAC",
                    "--profiling=false",
                    "--enable-admission-plugins=ServiceAccount,NamespaceLifecycle,NodeRestriction,LimitRanger,PersistentVolumeClaimResize,DefaultStorageClass,DefaultTolerationSeconds,MutatingAdmissionWebhook,ValidatingAdmissionWebhook,ResourceQuota,Priority",
                    "--tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256"
                ],
                "log": {
                    "level": 1
                }
            },
            "controllerManager": {
                "extraArgs": [
                    "--tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256",
                    "--terminated-pod-gc-threshold=12500",
                    "--node-monitor-period=5s",
                    "--node-monitor-grace-period=40s",
                    "--pod-eviction-timeout=5m0s",
                    "--profiling=false",
                    "--kube-api-qps=100",
                    "--kube-api-burst=100"
                ],
                "log": {
                    "level": 1
                }
            },
            "scheduler": {
                "extraArgs": [
                    "--tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256",
                    "--profiling=false",
                    "--kube-api-qps=100"
                ],
                "log": {
                    "level": 1
                }
            },
            "kubelet": {
                "extraArgs": [
                    "--anonymous-auth=false",
                    "--authorization-mode=Webhook",
                    "--allowed-unsafe-sysctls=net.*",
                    "--network-plugin=cni"
                ],
                "log": {
                    "level": 1
                }
            },
            "proxy": {
                "extraArgs": [
                    "--proxy-mode=ipvs"
                ],
                "log": {
                    "level": 1
                }
            }
        },
        "all": {
            "timezone": "Asia/Shanghai",
            "modprobe": {
                "filename": "/etc/modules-load.d/00-k8s.conf",
                "params": [
                    "br_netfilter",
                    "nf_conntrack",
                    "overlay",
                    "xt_REDIRECT",
                    "xt_owner",
                    "ip_tables",
                    "ip6table_filter"
                ]
            },
            "ipvs": {
                "filename": "/etc/modules-load.d/01-k8s.conf",
                "params": [
                    "ip_vs",
                    "ip_vs_rr",
                    "ip_vs_wrr",
                    "ip_vs_sh"
                ]
            },
            "sysctl": {
                "filename": "/etc/sysctl.d/100-kubernetes.conf",
                "params": {
                    "net.ipv6.ip_forward": 1,
                    "net.ipv6.conf.all.forwarding": 1,
                    "net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6": 0,
                    "net.ipv6.conf.default.disable_ipv6": 0,
                    "net.ipv6.conf.lo.disable_ipv6": 0,
                    "net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_time": 600,
                    "net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_intvl": 30,
                    "net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_probes": 10,
                    "net.ipv4.neigh.default.gc_stale_time": 120,
                    "net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter": 0,
                    "net.ipv4.conf.default.forwarding": 1,
                    "net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter": 0,
                    "net.ipv4.conf.default.arp_announce": 2,
                    "net.ipv4.conf.lo.arp_announce": 2,
                    "net.ipv4.conf.all.arp_announce": 2,
                    "net.ipv4.ip_forward": 1,
                    "net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_buckets": 5000,
                    "net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies": 1,
                    "net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog": 1024,
                    "net.ipv4.tcp_synack_retries": 2,
                    "net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-ip6tables": 1,
                    "net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-iptables": 1,
                    "net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-arptables": 1,
                    "net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_max": 10485760,
                    "fs.inotify.max_user_watches": 524288,
                    "fs.may_detach_mounts": 1,
                    "fs.file-max": 52706963,
                    "fs.nr_open": 52706963,
                    "vm.swappiness": 0,
                    "vm.overcommit_memory": 1,
                    "vm.panic_on_oom": 0,
                    "net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_established": 300,
                    "net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_close_wait": 3600,
                    "net.core.netdev_max_backlog": 10000,
                    "kernel.pid_max": 65535,
                    "net.core.default_qdisc": "fq",
                    "net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control": "bbr",
                    "net.ipv4.neigh.default.gc_thresh1": 1024,
                    "net.ipv4.neigh.default.gc_thresh2": 4096,
                    "net.ipv4.neigh.default.gc_thresh3": 8192,
                    "net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_buckets": 655360,
                    "fs.inotify.max_user_instances": 524288,
                    "net.core.rmem_max": 2500000,
                    "vm.max_map_count": 262144
                }
            },
            "limits": [
                {
                    "domain": "*",
                    "limit_type": "soft",
                    "limit_item": "nproc",
                    "value": 65536
                },
                {
                    "domain": "*",
                    "limit_type": "hard",
                    "limit_item": "nproc",
                    "value": 65536
                },
                {
                    "domain": "*",
                    "limit_type": "soft",
                    "limit_item": "nofile",
                    "value": 65536
                },
                {
                    "domain": "*",
                    "limit_type": "hard",
                    "limit_item": "nofile",
                    "value": 65536
                },
                {
                    "domain": "root",
                    "limit_type": "soft",
                    "limit_item": "nofile",
                    "value": 65536
                },
                {
                    "domain": "root",
                    "limit_type": "hard",
                    "limit_item": "nofile",
                    "value": 65536
                },
                {
                    "domain": "root",
                    "limit_type": "soft",
                    "limit_item": "nproc",
                    "value": "unlimited"
                },
                {
                    "domain": "root",
                    "limit_type": "hard",
                    "limit_item": "nproc",
                    "value": "unlimited"
                }
            ]
        }
    }
}

                    "net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_max": 10485760,
                    "fs.inotify.max_user_watches": 524288,
                    "fs.may_detach_mounts": 1,
                    "fs.file-max": 52706963,
                    "fs.nr_open": 52706963,
                    "vm.swappiness": 0,
                    "vm.overcommit_memory": 1,
                    "vm.panic_on_oom": 0,
                    "net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_established": 300,
                    "net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_close_wait": 3600,
                    "net.core.netdev_max_backlog": 10000,
                    "kernel.pid_max": 65535,
                    "net.core.default_qdisc": "fq",
                    "net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control": "bbr",
                    "net.ipv4.neigh.default.gc_thresh1": 1024,
                    "net.ipv4.neigh.default.gc_thresh2": 4096,
                    "net.ipv4.neigh.default.gc_thresh3": 8192,
                    "net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_buckets": 655360,
                    "fs.inotify.max_user_instances": 524288,
                    "net.core.rmem_max": 2500000,
                    "vm.max_map_count": 262144
                }
            },
            "limits": [
                {
                    "domain": "*",
                    "limit_type": "soft",
                    "limit_item": "nproc",
                    "value": 65536
                },
                {
                    "domain": "*",
                    "limit_type": "hard",
                    "limit_item": "nproc",
                    "value": 65536
                },
                {
                    "domain": "*",
                    "limit_type": "soft",
                    "limit_item": "nofile",
                    "value": 65536
                },
                {
                    "domain": "*",
                    "limit_type": "hard",
                    "limit_item": "nofile",
                    "value": 65536
                },
                {
                    "domain": "root",
                    "limit_type": "soft",
                    "limit_item": "nofile",
                    "value": 65536
                },
                {
                    "domain": "root",
                    "limit_type": "hard",
                    "limit_item": "nofile",
                    "value": 65536
                },
                {
                    "domain": "root",
                    "limit_type": "soft",
                    "limit_item": "nproc",
                    "value": "unlimited"
                },
                {
                    "domain": "root",
                    "limit_type": "hard",
                    "limit_item": "nproc",
                    "value": "unlimited"
                }
            ]
        }
    }
}
